mapper.insert: insert into tbl_member (member_name, member_phone, member_email, member_social_url, member_birth, member_gender, member_mbti, member_password) values (#{memberName}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberSocialUrl}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberGender}, #{memberMbti}, #{memberPassword})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_member where member_email = #{memberEmail} and member_status = 'active'
